Summary: Yes hello my girlfriend and I stay at the centery motel in Buena Park when our house is getting renovation nissian is a very good manager him and wife are super friendly never no negative y üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç I wouldn't pick no other place thanks to centery for giving us a home away from home

Summary Heading: Really cool manager, and affordable price.
Summary: Have been here before, it was not bad last time. But over couple of years they have improved to good extent. Great room service and also we needed some sort of help and the manager was quick to act. Quiet and clean neighborhood. Will visit again when we are back visiting OC.
Room tip: Fast Service, Suite is great! , A/C was bit noisy, Try the non-smoking rooms.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at Century Motel in Buena Park, Ca. The atmosphere is cozy and quiet. It is located close to shops and Knotts Berry Farm is minutes away. As well as Buena Park Mall is minutes away. The rooms are Cleanly and have been updated.

Great overall experience! I've read all those other reviews and in my opinion I THINK that they are late on taking their Meds! My room was very clean alil dated but very clean! Hardwood floors, internet, cable, and peaceful! Run by a small staff and they are so very accomendating!  Outside is kept clean also, Overall I enjoyed myself!
Room tip: Ask for a second floor South side room its away from the street, so no traffic noise

Summary: If you want free porn, and a "mattress" that feels like you are sleeping on hardwood floors and linens that smell and feel like they've never been washed, and bath towels that are only big enough for your face, buy this room. It was so horrible. It felt like one of those motels you see in the movies where people meet up with hookers and drug dealers. And we took our kids here! Absolutely terrible
